name: multisystem
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
medical
  specialized involving or affecting two or more of the body's organ systems: Lyme disease is a multisystem disease which can affect the skin, joints, and nervous system. One death occurred due to multisystem failure.
involving several systems: This technique permits multisystem data sharing. It's a workload management solution to manage large, multi-system environments.
More examplesFewer examplesThis disorder is a complex, multisystem condition that results from toxic exposure.It is a chronic multisystem disease involving primarily the pulmonary and gastrointestinal systems.In future, the majority of electric locomotive orders in Europe will require some kind of multi-system capability.The new agreements include everything from broadcast television and cable companies to multi-system operators.
